text.text: *Hello! My name is Slack Lackey and I am ready and waiting to share your favorite code snippets with the world,* (_or at least the portion of the world with a GitHub_) *by saving them as Gists in a shared GitHub account.*

*GET HELP*  -  Post a message containing `slack-lackey-help`

_I will show this message :sunglasses:._

*SAVE A CODE BLOCK*  -  Post a code block wrapped in three backticks ` ``` ` 

_I will ask you if you want to save it as a Gist._

*SAVE A CODE SNIPPET*  -  Click the :heavy_plus_sign: to the left of the message input box

 _I will ask if you want to save it as a Gist._

*SAVE AN EDITED CODE SNIPPET* _(before saving it as a Gist)_  -   Click the :pencil2: to the right of the Slack post.

 _I will ask if you want to save your edited snippet as a Gist._

*GET YOUR GISTS*  -  Post a message containing `get my gists`

 _I will bring back a list of all the Gists that you have previously created._
*It has been nice to meet you! Learn more about my creators by clicking the button below...*
